name: 玄女诛魔录
descr:
[h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/CG_2.png?t=1667183493[/img][/h2]
[list][h2]游戏简介[/h2]《玄女诛魔录》是一款传统风格的2D动作冒险游戏。玩家将在众多场景中与魔物战斗，帮助无辜者，并最终击败魔王拯救世界。[h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/机关.gif?t=1667183493[/img][/h2][h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/金币.gif?t=1667183493[/img][/h2][h2]游戏特色[/h2][li]细致的2d手绘美术
本游戏中所有的素材均为手绘完成。[h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/png_1.png?t=1667183493[/img][/h2][h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/png_2.png?t=1667183493[/img][/h2][h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/png_3.png?t=1667183493[/img][/h2]

[/li][li]美丽可爱的少女
本游戏主角是拥有超过200帧的全手绘动画倾力打造的年轻美丽且武艺高超的可爱少女。[h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/Player_Animator.gif?t=1667183493[/img][/h2]

[/li][li]丰富的2d动作成分
在游戏中玩家可以操作主角做出移动，跳跃，二段跳，冲刺，攀爬，悬挂，连击，使用灵力等诸多动作。[h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/杀虫子.gif?t=1667183493[/img][/h2][h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/二级跳.gif?t=1667183493[/img][/h2][h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/破墙.gif?t=1667183493[/img][/h2]
[/li][li]探索交错相通的庞大世界
玩家的冒险将在众多相连且交错贯通的世界中展开！

[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/png_Scene.png?t=1667183493[/img]

[/li][li]多种风格迥异的诡异敌人
众多不同的魔物敌人！在冒险中直面并击杀最邪恶的魔物！[h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/打boss.gif?t=1667183493[/img][/h2][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1490460/extras/1_8_.jpg?t=1667183493[/img][/li][/list]
